subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After being down by as many as 16 points, the Knicks overcame a sluggish first half to win in scintillating fashion, keeping the Knicks three and a half games ahead of eighth-place Indiana.
snippet: After being down by as many as 16 points, the Knicks overcame a sluggish first half to win in scintillating fashion, keeping the Knicks three and a half games ahead of eighth-place Indiana.
